professional_summary: IT professional with expertise in disaster recovery, maintenance, and technical support, experienced in various banking systems and applications.

key_responsibilities: Provided support services to end users.
Resolved technical problems through troubleshooting and coordination with IT staff.
Managed installation of new software and setup of user accounts.
Provided technical support to end users and branches.
Resolved Jack Henry system problems with 4Sight
Managed IT operations and system backups.
Administered AS400 and various banking applications.
Directed IT strategy and disaster recovery planning.
Supervised system upgrades and conversions on LOB applications.
Ensured high-quality support for critical projects.
